summary:
### Summary of GitHub Activity for scaffold-eth/se-2-challenges in April 2025

- **Major Features and Improvements:**
  - Merged the **Prediction Markets Challenge** (PR #286), introducing a new challenge with room for further enhancements.
  - Implemented a check to only set contract state when on a local Hardhat chain (PR #284), improving deployment efficiency.
  - Added verification for OP Retro Funding round 7, incorporating SpeedRunEthereum repositories into the project (PR #283).

- **Bug Fixes:**
  - Closed issue #287 regarding the CORN amounts not updating after a liquidation, indicating a resolution to a critical functionality issue.

- **Overall Themes:**
  - Focus on enhancing challenge features and improving deployment processes.
  - Active resolution of issues related to functionality and user experience.

topIssues.title: Over-Collateralized-Lending Challenge - CORN amounts not updating after a liquidation

topPRs.title: only set contract state when on hardhat chain
Add OP Retro Funding round 7 verification
